content:
Based on the execution logs and entity data, here's the updated report:

EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper Plate Production Line
- Two stone furnaces at positions (0.0, 0.0) and (2.0, 0.0)
- Both furnaces have coal fuel and produce copper plates

### Iron Plate Production Line
- Stone furnace at position (4.0, 4.0)
- Uses coal as fuel and produces iron plates

### Electronic Circuit Assembly Line
- Input chest at position (6.5, 11.5) containing iron plates
- Burner inserter at (7.5, 11.5) moving items from input chest to assembling machine
- Assembling machine at (9.5, 11.5) crafting electronic circuits
- Burner inserter at (11.5, 11.5) moving finished products
- Output chest at (12.5, 11.5) storing iron plates, copper plates and electronic circuits

### Power Generation System
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, 24.5) providing water
- Pipe network connecting water from pump to boiler
- Boiler at (-7.0, 24.5) converting water to steam
- Steam pipe network connecting boiler to steam engine
- Steam engine at (-2.5, 24.5) generating electricity
- Electric pole network distributing power

### Science Pack Distribution System
- Storage chest at (0.5, 31.5) containing automation and logistic science packs
- Burner inserter at (0.5, 30.5) moving science packs
- Lab at (0.5, 28.5) consuming science packs for research

ERROR TIPS

### Inventory Management Errors
- Monitor inventory capacity before harvesting resources
- Clear inventory space when it becomes full to continue harvesting operations

### Container Capacity Errors
- Check chest capacity before inserting items
- Remove excess items from chests when they become full
- Consider upgrading to steel chests for larger storage capacity

### Research Errors
- Check if technology is already researched before attempting to research it again
- Keep track of completed research technologies

### Resource Insertion Errors
- Verify required items are in inventory before attempting to insert them into machines
- Maintain adequate fuel supplies for burner devices
